block.p: MOSSACK-Robert, D.D.S. Members of the Medical/Dental Staff mourn the untimely death of Robert Mossack, D.D.S., a member of the Hospital Dental Staff since January 1986. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to the Mossack family. Deborah Tascone, R.N., M.S., Executive Director Alan Mensch, M.D., Med Director Bruce Kappel, M.D., President, Medical/Dental Staff Jeffrey Haberman, M.D., President Elect, Medical/Dental Staff North Shore University Hospital at Plainview
